Core mass during the TP-AGB, otherwise null (Msun)
Surface C/O ratio by number, n_C/n_O
Period of fundamental mode (days) if LPV, otherwise null

Period of second overtone mode (days) if LPV, otherwise null
Period of third overtone mode (days) if LPV, otherwise null
Period of fourth overtone mode (days) if LPV, otherwise null
Expected pulsation mode if LPV, fundamental=0, first overtone=1, second overtone=2, third overtone=3, fourth overtone=4, -1 otherwise
Mass loss rate (M_sun/year)
Optical depth at 1 micron, for stars w/ heavy mass loss

Core mass of the primary during the TP-AGB, otherwise null (M_sun)
Surface abundance ratio by number, n_C/n_O, during the TP-AGB phase of the primary
Period for classical Cepheid and LBV, in days, in the fundamental mode for the primary. Cepheids contain only period0, period1. Values are set to 0 for the other stars.
Period for classical Cepheid and LBV, in days, in the first overtone mode for the primary. Cepheids contain only period0, period1. Values are set to 0 for the other stars.
Period for classical Cepheid and LBV, in days, in the second overtone mode for the primary. Cepheids contain only period0, period1. Values are set to 0 for the other stars.
Period for classical Cepheid and LBV, in days, in the third overtone mode for the primary. Cepheids contain only period0, period1. Values are set to 0 for the other stars.
Period for classical Cepheid and LBV, in days, in the fourth overtone mode for the primary. Cepheids contain only period0, period1. Values are set to 0 for the other stars.

HTM index (order-9 -> ~10 arcmin size)
Ring-scheme HEALPix (Gorski et al. 2005) index with NSIDE=256 (~14 arcmin resolution)
HEALPIX index (Nsides 4096, Nest scheme => ~52 arcsec size)
Galactic component the binary belongs to: thin disk=1, thick disk=2, halo=3, bulge=4, Magellanic Clouds=5
Evolutionary phase of the primary, PMS=0, MS=1, SGB=2, RGB=3, CHeB=4,5,6, EAGB=7, TPAGB=8, PAGB+WD=9

Radial order of the dominant pulsation mode for the primary, (0 is the fundamental mode, 1 is the first overtone, and so on). It has value 0 or 1 for classical Cepheids, from 0 to 4 for LPVs, and is set to -1 for the other stars
Stellar type of the primary
Evolutionary phase of the secondary, PMS=0, MS=1, SGB=2, RGB=3, CHeB=4,5,6, EAGB=7, TPAGB=8, PAGB+WD=9

Radial order of the dominant pulsation mode for the secondary, (0 is the fundamental mode, 1 is the first overtone, and so on). It has value 0 or 1 for classical Cepheids, from 0 to 4 for LPVs, and is set to -1 for the other stars
Stellar type of the secondary
Radial velocity amplitude in R_Sun/year
Radial velocity amplitude in R_Sun/year
Maximum depth of the primary eclipse, in magnitudes, in the r band
Maximum depth of the secondary eclipse, in magnitudes, in the r band
